solution_line_template: Before throwing the cookies, Alice and Bob baked {alice_initial} + {bob_initial} = <<{alice_initial}+{bob_initial}={initial_total}>>{initial_total} cookies.
After throwing the cookies, they baked {alice_more} + {bob_more} = <<{alice_more}+{bob_more}={more_total}>>{more_total} cookies.
They threw {total_baked} - {edible_cookies} = <<{total_baked}-{edible_cookies}={thrown_away}>>{thrown_away} cookies on the floor.
